section.p: You cast grappling hooks to hold your vessel alongside the slavers’ ship while ladders are flung out to allow your crew to go board. The Uttakin warriors stand ready to receive you; their smiles give a sensation of grim foreboding.

Roll three dice
if you are a Warrior,
or
two dice
if you belong to any other profession.
Add your Rank to this roll.
Then, if your crew is poor quality, subtract 2 from the total. If the crew is good quality, add 2. If the crew is excellent quality, add 3.
